title: How To Pronounce Mundo
body:
http://i.space.com/images/i/000/029/533/original/full-moon-juarez-mexico.jpg?1370018129 + http://www.abenzymes.com/wp-content/files_mf/cache/th_fda751ccf7f94f62d15e5b3bde725d3b_1314014643iStock_000005460442Large.jpg

Apparently this was not clear enough. Here is a second option:

http://caccioppoli.com/2008%20gifs%202/Cows/0226.gif + "N" + http://media.giphy.com/media/TTnc614GboUow/giphy.gif

replies.body: Got it. From now on I will correctly say Dr. Lunaknead.

> [{quoted}](name=Yorukin,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=B0xdfNyL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-17T16:10:27.348+0000)
>
> Got it. From now on I will correctly say Dr. Lunaknead.

This is not the right way to do it. Still I up-voted you because I appreciate your trying! Have another go!
Mr. Cowdog?
MÃ¥ne dej??? Lol
Mundo pronounces Mundo how Mundo pleases!
Dr. Cow-Thief
There has been some confusion on the pronunciations so I added a second option.
"Mundo say his own name a lot, or else he forget!"
"Has happened before!"
correct me if I'm wrong, but I don't think this guy is cut out to be a doctor...

> [{quoted}](name=Snitch Ninja,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=B0xdfNyL,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-07-18T08:47:41.995+0000)
>
> correct me if I'm wrong, but I don't think this guy is cut out to be a doctor...

I would trust him. He seems like a nice guy.
dr. spacehomer, got it
Dr. Cownchips?
LOL

pretty sure people that say "muhndo" are doing it on purpose, but I like your pictures! 

And a fun fact: "Mundo" means "world" in Spanish and Portuguese

I hate when people pronounce his name "Muhn-dough"
Mundo says his own name in game, quite a lot.
I never understood how people get it wrong.
because in english the U makes the uh sound

But he says his own name in game. {{champion:36}} 
He says Moon-Dough
Not Muhn-Dough
English or not, I like to assume the characters own 
pronunciation is proper.
Downvote was unnecessary btw what was that for?
Mun-dough

Apparently he says his own name in his VO constantly in-game.

So there's that.
Kerbal Space Program disagrees, all hail the Mun!

You can't tell me how to pronounce things you mungo

Haha
